name: GOVERNMENT OF PUERTO RICO
sampleDescriptions: Advocacy related to FY22 appropriations and infrastructure priorities.
Advocacy for Puerto Rico's priority transportation and infrastructure projects.
Advocacy for solution to Puerto Rico's Medicaid fiscal cliff.
Advocacy related to Puerto Ricos power grid/infrastructure.
Issues related to H-2B Visa cap.
Issues related to EPA and Clean Air Act compliance.
Advocacy related to the Farm Bill and shifting Puerto Rico from NAP to SNAP.
Advocacy related to Puerto Ricos appropriations priorities, including disaster supplemental funding.
Advocacy related to FEMA Sec. 428 alternative procedures program.
Advocacy related to Puerto Rico status legislation.
Advocacy related to the rum cover over excise tax and other tax policy priorities.
